name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The difference between China's high school "Politics and Ideology" textbooks and Taiwan's high school "Citizenship and Society" textbooks: China's textbooks constantly emphasize the legitimacy of the Communist Party and Xi Jinping's rule, while Taiwan's textbooks are aimed at actively cultivating students' civic awareness.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: For more comparisons, please watch "Xi Jinping Thought Enters Campus: Chinese Ideological and Political Courses VS Taiwan Citizenship Courses, the Differences between Citizenship Education on Both Sides of the Taiwan Strait"
